CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( BusinessArea__c, "ZK" ), "Cold Heading; ",null ) & IF ( ISPICKVAL ( BusinessArea__c , "ZF" ), "Spring Steel; ",null ) & IF ( ISPICKVAL ( BusinessArea__c, "ZS" ), "Free Cutting Steel (SZO); ",null ) & IF ( ISPICKVAL ( BusinessArea__c, "ZW" ), "Bearing Steel; ",null ) & IF ( ISPICKVAL ( BusinessArea__c, "ZM" ), "Forging Steel; ",null ) & IF ( ISPICKVAL ( BusinessArea__c, "ZZ" ), "Drawing Grades; ",null )
CustomField.label: VisitBA
